question: In which of the following years Hailey’s comet has to appear in the solar family?
explanation: Halley\'s Comet is arguably the most famous comet. It is a \"periodic\" comet and returns to Earth\'s vicinity about every 75 years, making it possible for a human to see it twice in his or her lifetime. The last time it was here was in 1986, and it is projected to return in 2061.
